page_content: The page discusses the 20th anniversary of the Sanitätsnotrufzentrale 144 Graubünden, a medical emergency call center.
The page discusses upcoming construction projects on roads in the canton of Graubünden for the year 2023.
The page announces the appointment of Alberto Palaia as the delegate for the newly created Multilingualism Office in the canton of Graubünden.
The page discusses an inquiry regarding the surveillance of cantonal parliamentarians, specifically focusing on data collection and state security measures.
The page reports on the success of the SuperBiker event organized by the Kantonspolizei, aimed at educating motorcyclists about common accident causes and safety measures.
The page discusses various decisions made by the Bündner Regierung, including changes in fishing regulations, cultural events, and appointments.
The page informs about traffic disruptions due to the Mountainbike Event Swiss Epic taking place in various locations in Graubünden from August 16 to 20, 2022.
